name: Hansen Law Offices
tag_list: burlington, iowa, ia, lawyers, attorneys, law-firm, legal, law-office, peter-hansen, accidents, bankruptcy, criminal-law, legal-malpractice, litigation, medical-malpractice, personal-injury, product-liability, toxic-torts, trial-law
overview:
Hansen Law Offices in Burlington, Iowa has over 30 years of experience in representing clients in the state and federal courts. Their primary goal is to diligently ensure that our clients receive the best legal assistance available, while maintaining all of their rights afforded under the law.

Hansen Law Offices is a full service law firm providing services in most areas of the law with the high concentration devoted to General Practice, Including but not Limited to: Accidents, Bankruptcy, Criminal Law, Legal Malpractice, Litigation, Medical Malpractice, Personal Injury, Product Liability, Toxic Torts, and Trial Law.

milestones.description: Lawdragon Top 500 Leading Lawyers in America.
